entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Discrepancy between IDE0072 and CS8510 #76080
  • Enumerators incorrectly allow continued enumerator after disposal #76078
  • Flaky test TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources #76069
    17.13
  • Need help to support target runtime "linux-loongarch64" #76065

Closed

  • IDE0251 (Make member readonly) false positive when GetEnumerator() is not readonly #72335
  • Unnecessary assignment ... message - incorrect #72278
  • Pasting content into raw string doesn't respect smart ident #72267
    Backlog
  • Explicit interface member completion doesn't work with params collections #72224
    Backlog
  • Primary constructors: Add node for primary parameter variables #70564
    Backlog
  • Fixer for IDE0251 results in poorly formatted code #69876
    Backlog
  • Completions suggest unreachable variables in static local functions #66982
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]: Breaking change - Make some types static #65909
    Backlog
  • IDE0120 does not work in various cases (Where+Count) #71293
  • Suppress IDE0044/IDE0051 for [InlineArray] types #69143
    17.13
  • When opening IntelliSense using Ctrl - J, current item is not in alphabetical order #71745
    17.13
  • IDE2001 is not compatible with brace placement at the end of a line #72189
    17.13
  • Roslyn Transform "Convert to interpolated string" does not account for quotes #68425
  • Failed assert at AbstractSymbolDisplayService.AbstractSymbolDescriptionBuilder.GetSemanticModel #72020
  • "Convert to raw string" code fix is not always available for `$@` strings #72082
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72075
  • Codefix suggestion: use collection expression spread when collection types don't match #72055
    Backlog
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72074
  • Regular occurrence of `Feature 'Rename' is currently unavailable` error #72036
  • The "return switch" syntax does not generate as efficient IL as normal switch #76075
  • Symbol completion doesn't work on empty nameof in certain attributes #60812
    Backlog
  • Perf ddrits regression in WP64.ProjectManagement 0200.Xaml Designer Load #72010
    Backlog
  • Automatically proffer and register remote brokered services into Roslyn LSP #71998
  • Roslyn LSP server is packaging more than it should #71978
  • Separate reference count. Invocation and inheritance are shown in two parts. #71928
  • Quote completion improvements #71898
  • .NET WinForms: IntelliSense remark IDE0051 shown for own class methods, but not for Form class methods #71870
  • Completion tooltips stop working #71841
  • Interceptor for Code Navigation for Source Generators #71805
  • Hide duplicates caused by "starred" items in IntelliSense #71744
  • `EventHookupCommandHandler` stuck and hangs VS #71643
    Backlog
  • Go to definition doesn't mark the selected symbol the first time but just opens the source file #71568
  • Equality operators are offered in completion in lambda expression in extension method when its input type is inaccessible record #71401
  • [feature request] Insight into what exceptions can reach a certain part of the code #71308
    Backlog
  • IDE0200 is not reported in .NET 8 but works in .NET 7 for injected dependencies #71300
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
    Backlog
  • Symbol loading issue in Visual Studio: 'Go to Definition' in solution with solution filters only opens metadata of class #71074
  • Intellisense cannot determine type when inside a Tuple of Predicates #71041
  • Add some tests covering removing metadata references with MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges #71023
    Backlog
  • Add tests for MSBuildWorkspace on Windows containing options with quotes in them #71021
    Backlog
  • Reduce the size of the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHost directories #70945
  • The ```Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.VisualStudioMSBuildWorkspaceTests.TestOpenProject_WithInvalidProjectReference_SkipFalse_Fails``` unit-test started failing locally for .NET Core #70858
  • Test CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.TestNonBlockingExpandCompletionDoesNotChangeItemOrder failed in CI #70835
  • `IDE0028` suggests collection expression when assigning to a `dynamic` LHS #70822
  • Multiple errors are generated when using Quick Actions on a IDE0028 Message in .NET 8 #70818
    Backlog
  • Completion UI not called when typed char is a number #70798
    18.0
  • SourceGenerator not generating the latest code #70771
  • Find Usages presenter keeps a GC root to a full Solution #70753
  • ??= operator generates IDE0052 notice #70728
    Backlog
  • Line completion forces suggested method parameter when typing quotes, causing an error #70661
  • CompletionService cannot be resolved in Blazor WASM #70404
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35524.17 #76063

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump versions of dependencies coming from maintenance-packages #76076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package versions and remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [vscode] Fix failing official builds #76071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 architecture to roslyn #76064
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Improve the cases that 'simplify linq' works on #76079
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not show uncapturable outer parameters inside static local functions. #76043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix formatting when making an accessor readonly #76054
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make approved api changes #76040
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Fix parameters not showing up in 'nameof' on a method #76017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not offer to remove the primary field from an inline array #76052
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue producing interpolated strings from char literals #76049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Suppress IDE namespace warning #76077
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add comment about supported values of platform switch #76072
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update docs to add a new LangVer #76011
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76074
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix LangVersion computation on non-English locales #76070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.13P2 #76067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add a helper to determine if a type has a specific attribute or not. #76053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support ExperimentalAttribute.Message #76060
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Use partial analysis results to filter out analyzers that need to be executed. #76062
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft] Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose FAR to cohosting #76002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
